news:
- Several API changes: Bottom navigation, choice chips, sliders, list items and snackbars
- Include ODS composables parameters description in the documentation
- Several API changes: Cards ans sliders

- Several API changes
- Two new components available: List item and toggle text buttons group

- Two new components in the library: Image item and large top app bar
- Add XML support for buttons and icon buttons

- Generalize code implementation section for components in the demo app
- Add the first XML component: OdsBanner

- One new component added in the library: Navigation drawer
- Search feature added in the demo app
- Three components added in the library: Banners, horizontal cards and bottom sheets

- Two components added in the library: Floating Action Button (FAB) and menus (dropdown menu and exposed dropdown menu)
- Food content and illustrations added in the demo app
